comments.body: Let's fix this in a separate PR, but we should remove the snapshotter argument from external-snapshotter since it must always be equal to the driver name.  It was a mistake to have this in the external provisioner and there is a bug open to remove it.

When we run the e2e every time, the driver name is different 
```
NewDriverName:     "csi-hostpath-" + h.f.UniqueName,
``` 
so we should clean the test logic too, I agree that we can fix it in a separate pr.
